content:
TITLE: Running the MoneyPrinterPlus Application
DESCRIPTION: Command to start the MoneyPrinterPlus application using Streamlit.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ddean2009/moneyprinterplus/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
streamlit run gui.py
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Launching MoneyPrinterPlus GUI with Streamlit
DESCRIPTION: Command to start the MoneyPrinterPlus graphical user interface using Streamlit framework.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ddean2009/moneyprinterplus/blob/main/docs/en/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
streamlit run gui.py
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Python Dependencies
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the required Python packages using pip and the requirements.txt file.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ddean2009/moneyprinterplus/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pip install -r requirements.txt
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Dependencies with pip in Python
DESCRIPTION: Command to install required packages for the MoneyPrinterPlus project using pip package manager.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ddean2009/moneyprinterplus/blob/main/docs/en/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pip install -r requirements.txt
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Automatic Start Script on Mac/Linux
DESCRIPTION: Bash command to execute the automatic start script for the MoneyPrinterPlus project on Mac or Linux systems.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ddean2009/moneyprinterplus/blob/main/docs/en/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
bash start.sh
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Automatic Installation Script on Mac/Linux
DESCRIPTION: Bash command to execute the automatic installation script for the MoneyPrinterPlus project on Mac or Linux systems.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ddean2009/moneyprinterplus/blob/main/docs/en/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
bash setup.sh
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Chrome Debug Mode Launch Command (Mac)
DESCRIPTION: Bash alias and command to launch Chrome browser in debug mode for automated video publishing
SOURCE: https://github.com/ddean2009/moneyprinterplus/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
alias chrome="/Applications/Google\ Chrome.app/Contents/MacOS/Google\ Chrome"
chrome --remote-debugging-port=9222
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Launching Chrome in Debug Mode
DESCRIPTION: Bash command to start Google Chrome in remote debugging mode, which is necessary for the automation tool to interact with the browser.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ddean2009/moneyprinterplus/blob/main/docs/en/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
chrome --remote-debugging-port=9222
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting Chrome Alias for Mac
DESCRIPTION: Bash command to create an alias for launching Google Chrome on macOS. This simplifies the process of starting Chrome in debug mode for automation purposes.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ddean2009/moneyprinterplus/blob/main/docs/en/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
alias chrome="/Applications/Google\ Chrome.app/Contents/MacOS/Google\ Chrome"
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Python Package Dependencies List
DESCRIPTION: Comprehensive list of Python package dependencies with specific version requirements for the MoneyPrinterPlus project. Includes AI/ML frameworks, speech processing libraries, web interfaces, and utility packages.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ddean2009/moneyprinterplus/blob/main/requirements.txt#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: plaintext
CODE:
```
langchain_openai==0.1.1
langchain==0.1.20
langchain-community==0.0.38
tenacity==8.3.0
openai==1.16.2
azure-cognitiveservices-speech==1.36.0
streamlit==1.34.0
wxPython
pillow
qianfan==0.3.15
dashscope
aliyun-python-sdk-core==2.15.1
tencentcloud-sdk-python-tts==3.0.1168
pydub
psutil
selenium==4.20.0
pyperclip
pyaudio
torch==2.3.1
pybase16384
numpy==1.26.4
faster-whisper==1.0.3
requests
aiohttp
sherpa-onnx
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Video Script Template
DESCRIPTION: Example script content showing how to format video descriptions for the mixing tool, with each line representing a possible script variation
SOURCE: https://github.com/ddean2009/moneyprinterplus/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: txt
CODE:
```
精准的剪裁，流畅的线条，这款马甲的版型设计，完美贴合身形，无论是宽松还是修身，都能展现你的优雅姿态。
我们的设计师们，将经典与现代完美融合。每一道线条，每一个剪裁，都是为了展现你的独特身形。
每一刀剪裁，都经过精心计算，只为打造最适合你身形的版型。从肩部线条到腰部剪裁，每一处都彰显着你的独特风格。
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Sample Video Resource Text File Content
DESCRIPTION: Example content of a text file containing video resource descriptions for use in the MoneyPrinterPlus project's batch video splicing feature.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ddean2009/moneyprinterplus/blob/main/docs/en/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: txt
CODE:
```
Accurate cutting, smooth lines, the design of this vest perfectly fits the body shape, whether it is loose or slim, it can show your elegant posture.
Our designers perfectly blend classic and modern styles. Every line and every cut is to showcase your unique body shape.
Every precise cut is carefully calculated to create the most suitable style for your body. From the shoulder line to the waist cut, each part showcases your unique style.
Accurate cutting, smooth lines, the design of this vest is intended to make every wearer feel the tailored fit.
Accurate cutting, smooth lines, the design of this vest fits perfectly, showing elegant posture whether it's loose or slim.
Designers blend classic and modern styles, every line and cut showcases a unique body shape.
Every precise cut is carefully calculated to create a style that suits your body shape, showcasing a unique style from the shoulder line to the waist cut.
Accurate cutting and smooth lines, the vest design is aimed at a tailored fit, showcasing the wearer's personal charm.
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Video Title and Description Format
DESCRIPTION: Example format for video title and description text file used in automated publishing
SOURCE: https://github.com/ddean2009/moneyprinterplus/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: txt
CODE:
```
王维：酬郭给事
洞门高阁霭馀辉，桃李阴阴柳絮飞。
禁里疏钟官舍晚，省中啼鸟吏人稀。
晨摇玉佩趋金殿，夕奉天书拜琐闱。
强欲从君无那老，将因卧病解朝衣。
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Sample Video Text Content
DESCRIPTION: Example of a text file content associated with a video, including a title and poem content. This text is used by the tool when uploading videos to provide titles and descriptions.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ddean2009/moneyprinterplus/blob/main/docs/en/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: txt
CODE:
```
Wang Wei: To Guo Geshi
The high pavilion door is covered in lingering light, with peach and plum trees shading and willow catkins flying.
The sparse bells in the forbidden palace chime late, and the crying birds in the provincial office are rare.
Morning shakes the jade pendants and rushes to the golden palace, while evening offers the heavenly book and bows in the imperial hall.
I want to accompany you without growing old, and I'll lay down my morning attire due to illness.
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Video Resource Directory Path
DESCRIPTION: Example path format for storing video resources in scene directories
SOURCE: https://github.com/ddean2009/moneyprinterplus/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
d:\downloads\work\scen1
```
